At each poll, the Le Pen family had its 500 signatures. There is no reason that this time she does not have them. # France3 # FH2012
I will not comment. Mrs Le Pen must look for signatures. If she has them, she will be a candidate # France3 # FH2012
If Ms. Le Pen does not have them, it is true that it will be a problem, but I can not solve it. # France3 # FH2012
I will not let myself be impressed by any poll. # France3 # FH2012
If I look at them all, I should consider that this election is already made. # France3 # FH2012
No, it is not done. An election, it deserves, a vote, it is conquered. Nothing is done, nothing is acquired. # France3 # FH2012
I want to have the respect of the French and I have to give them confidence, I have to show them the change # France3 # FH2012
The role of a President of the Republic is not to create confusion, it is to create clarity. # France3 # FH2012
I'm not sure. If I had any certainty, I would not campaign, I have a duty of conviction. # France3 # FH2012

Today we sign the bill of the new Civil Procedure Code that seeks to modernize, streamline and bring justice to people.
This reform to the civil justice will reduce from 821 to 170 the average days that a trial lasts, also lowering its cost: http://t.co/e8b0eQv9
Therefore, I ask the members of Congress and the Judicial Branch for their collaboration so that this reform is, as soon as possible, a reality.

The deadline is approaching, the issue is clear: does France want to continue with the candidate-outgoing the same policy? #Valence # FH2012
Does France want to change destiny by coming together, towards justice and towards youth? #Valence # FH2012
We carry, and it is my responsibility, the great idea of ​​the alternation, the change that must come if you decide. #Valence # FH2012
Beyond an income of one million euros, there must be a mastery, a decency, a limit. #Valence # FH2012
I want to change France to give youth the place that must be hers. #Valence # FH2012
With us, the School will regain confidence because we will give it the essential means to its mission! #Valence # FH2012
That all the young people of France can say that by the School, it is possible to change one's destiny. #Valence # FH2012
France must gather on high ideas, and not on fears! #Valence # FH2012
I want to protect France by bringing it together, by bringing it together, and not by opposing it. #Valence # FH2012
There are not many France in the country of France! #Valence # FH2012
I am told "courage", but we have the courage! We have it because we are aware of what is at stake! #Valence # FH2012
I am also told "hold on" but I want! It's you who give me the ability to win France! #Valence # FH2012
We especially learned that he had been a bad President. #Valence # FH2012
A five-year term is not an apprenticeship! #Valence # FH2012
We had not seen everything: after having made 6 immigration laws in 10 years, now he is attacking the spouses of Frenchmen. #Valence
Curious conception of equality! #Valence # FH2012
And now he is attacking Schengen! #Valence # FH2012
We want to add an indispensable dimension to the European treaty: growth! #Valence # FH2012
France can not be abused 5 more years. #Valence # FH2012
The time of responsibility has come. #Valence # FH2012
"Patriarch Rahi strives to protect the free presence of Christians in the Middle East and their role in dialogue between cultures"
I have three principles: to speak the truth, to respect my duty of coherence, and to give hope to France. #Valence # FH2012
France deserves better than she has for too long. #Valence # FH2012
The right will fight until his last breath. It considers that power is its property, its heritage. #Valence # FH2012
Do not be impressed by anything: neither by the surge of means, nor by the procession of images or the accumulation of polls. # FH2012
What matters to me is not polls! #Valence # FH2012
What matters to me is the vote of the French, of whom I know nothing and to whom we owe everything. #Valence # FH2012
Remember one thing: nothing is done, nothing is won. Hold on tight! #Valence # FH2012
You are the actors of hope. #Valence # FH2012
Go get the French, go convince them: it is in the first round that the dynamics is created. #Valence # FH2012

Viva Fidel, Guerrilla of Time, Guerrilla of All Time!
A few days ago we were joking. I told him: "You are a dangerous Guerrilla fighter" and he told me: "Nothing is as dangerous as an experienced Guerrilla"
One day I was walking with him through the sheets of the Orinoco. He asked me about Fidel. I told him he was fine. And Lula said looking away: "He's the last Giant."

Thank you for your presence, thank you for your enthusiasm, thank you for your confidence! #Marseille # FH2012
It is here that 30% of the population lives below the poverty line. #Marseille # FH2012
It is here that youth unemployment reaches 40% depending on the neighborhood. #Marseille # FH2012
This is where you decided to fight and change. I will help you! #Marseille # FH2012
It is here too that insecurity has developed. The law of force will now oppose the force of law. #Marseille # FH2012
In 2013, I wish to be the President who will inaugurate the European Capital of Culture here. #Marseille # FH2012
I am not the candidate of the double game. #Marseille # FH2012
The hope of France is its youth. That's why I bring it to the heart of my project! #Marseille # FH2012
The outgoing candidate treats youth as assisted. I think young people are a chance for our country! #Marseille # FH2012
I prefer to protect the youth of France than the richest in France! #Marseille # FH2012
I do not want one child of the Republic to be excluded from culture, art, knowledge. #Marseille # FH2012
The hope I want to give, the confidence I want to give to the French, is also employment. #Marseille # FH2012
The retirement will be 60 years for those who have worked 41 years! #Marseille # FH2012
The generational contract is the reconciliation of ages! http://t.co/doCx8a0O #Marseille # FH2012
Hope is also training, training throughout life! #Marseille # FH2012
I will institute 20 hours of law training per year for those who have graduated from school without a diploma. #Marseille # FH2012
The school of the first, of the second, of the third chance, as much as it will be necessary for none to feel relegated. #Marseille # FH2012
The Republic is also a language spoken all over the world. I want all children in France to know this language. # FH2012
Mastery of the language, at school, will be a priority for me. It's early on that everything is played out. #Marseille # FH2012
We will set up a support network for lone parents because we also have to help parents to help their own children.
I will stop the zoning. No more ZEPs and other areas. #Marseille # FH2012
The Republic does not know the areas, only the citizens. #Marseille # FH2012
I announced the creation of 1000 additional police and gendarme positions each year. #Marseille # FH2012
What did the candidate-outgoing for 5 years? #Marseille # FH2012
An incumbent candidate can not have the strength that a new President will have! #Marseille # FH2012
Tax exiles have nothing to fear. Nothing to fear from him! #Marseille # FH2012
Change, I want to bring it to all the French who are living the expensive life. #Marseille # FH2012
I do not forget the oldest, to whom we owe solidarity and respect. #Marseille # FH2012
I also want to say that the plight of the disabled in our country is not acceptable. #Marseille # FH2012
We must love our country to serve it well. I believe in patriotism, in the love of his people. #Marseille # FH2012
Patriotism is also that of young people who engage in associations. #Marseille # FH2012
Victory will depend on our ability to convince our fellow citizens. #Marseille # FH2012
We have 39 days left before the first round, and every day must be a useful day for our country. #Marseille # FH2012
I will not win alone! #Marseille # FH2012
I do not ask for your help, I do not need help, I need the will of the French people to change! #Marseille # FH2012
I want to win, more than for the left, I want to win for France! #Marseille # FH2012
The polls indicate nothing but intentions. What we need to solicit are votes! #Marseille # FH2012
People of France, you can not turn to the extreme right, which denies progress and freedom! #Marseille # FH2012
Suffrage is the most beautiful of revolts! #Marseille # FH2012
If we want to create a dynamic and therefore a victory, it is in the first round that we must give the change the necessary force!
We have before us the most beautiful appointment: the one we took with the French. #Marseille # FH2012
Let's make this appointment a happy rendez-vous for France. #Marseille # FH2012
For years I made a promise: give a successor on the left to François Mitterrand. #Marseille # FH2012
Let's write together the book of the Republic! #Marseille # FH2012
